statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -11 \\ 9 \\ -7 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -19 \\ 6 \\ -14 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
